description: Turns on or turns off optional features in Resource Groups. The preceding example shows that the request to turn on group lifecycle events is IN_PROGRESS. You can call the  GetAccountSettings operation to check for completion by looking for GroupLifecycleEventsStatus to change to ACTIVE.

parameters.name: GroupLifecycleEventsDesiredStatus
parameters.description: Specifies whether you want to turn group lifecycle events on or off. You can't turn on group lifecycle events if your resource groups quota is greater than 2,000.

nested_items.name: AccountSettings
nested_items.description: A structure that displays the status of the optional features in the account.

nested_items.name: GroupLifecycleEventsDesiredStatus
nested_items.description: The desired target status of the group lifecycle events feature. If.

nested_items.name: GroupLifecycleEventsStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the group lifecycle events feature.

nested_items.name: GroupLifecycleEventsStatusMessage
nested_items.description: The text of any error message occurs during an attempt to turn group lifecycle events on or off.
